name: Spicy Tilapia and Feta Cakes
author: Raquel Teixeira
summary: Wholesome fish dishes do not have to be boring. I love crab cakes...I have made tuna cakes...so why not tilapia cakes? Add some feta and hot sauce and really make it an interesting fish dish. Serve with a dill sauce or simple sour cream.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add tilapia fillets, salt, and pepper and cook until easily flaked with a fork, about 2 minutes on each side
Turn off the heat and shred the fish with 2 forks
Toss the fish with bread crumbs, green onions, egg, lemon juice, feta cheese, garlic powder, dill, and hot sauce
Form patties with your hand and refrigerate for at least 1 hour
Set a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook patties in the hot oil until golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes on each side
